author: Bang Xiao, Iris Zhao And Christina Zhou
title: 'I was being played like a clown': How the coronavirus pandemic could shift the multicultural make-up of our society
description: Foreign workers and international students largely miss out on emergency economic measures like JobKeeper. But could the cost of leaving them out in the cold prove to be too great a price down the track?
content:
Posted 
April 11, 2020 05:02:47
Excluding international students and migrant workers from emergency economic measures in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic could lead to unintended economic consequences, migration experts have warned.
